name: Attack On Chicken
description:
Kill the Chickens! Save the world!

"I've seen enough my race being killed and eaten by humans. Today will be the last day they see us lowly. Charge!!! This earth is ours! Chickens will dominate!!!" Said the Colosal Chicken before kicking the city's wall and destroy it...

This is just a parody game featuring the story of Attack on Titan. You are the Chicken Hunter. You'll be the last hope of humanity that defend the last wall of the city. Once the wall is destroyed, everything's over. Chicken won, human perished, it's a disaster!!!

BETTER EXPERIENCE WITH MOUSE AND FAST INTERNET CONNECTION
